Name: Sargent peppers #201
Description: Extremely meaty, with delectable flavor that is rich, sweet and very well balanced

Name: Persuasion #216
Description: This developing indigo tomato showcases pink and orange tones, splashed with shimmery gold, green and purple speckles and striping - absolutely gorgeous.

Name: CRUSHED HEART #206
Description: Gorgeous, multicolored and striped, heart-shaped fruits have shimmery-indigo shoulders and coral colored flesh.

Name: GREEN ZEBRA #22
Description: Beautiful chartreuse with deep lime-green stripes, very attractive. Flesh is bright green and very rich tasting, sweet with a sharp bite to it

Name: AMALFI ORANGE #101
Description: Amalfi Orange F1 is a new orange beefsteak tomato that combines heirloom flavor with commercial slicer fruit characteristics.

Name: MIDNIGHT SUN #59
Description: These absolutely massive, oxheart fruits, are produced on strong yet wispy, potato leaf vines. They ripen to a glowing, sunshine yellow with a deep red pointed base and have a beautiful sunset swirled flesh. Rich and sweet flavor with very meaty

Name: ALICE”S DREAM #232
Description: Vigorous plants produce beautiful beefsteak fruits with dark antho shoulders, a vibrant orange base, and bicolor swirled flesh.

Name: Orange Jazzy#5
Description: Orange Jazz produces visually stunning fruits with a unique, refreshing flavor. The huge beefsteaks, weighing up to 1 lb. each, have luminous orange skins striped with pale orange and yellow

Name: PURPLE CHEROKEE #6
Description: Popular 'Heirloom Tomato' known for its unusual looks and remarkable flavor. The fruits are large (12 to 16 ounces), dark pink with darker purple shoulders

Name: RED ROMA #9
Description: “Medium size red plum, great for tomato sauce

Name: RUTGERS BEEFSTEAK #8
Description: The legendary Jersey tomato, introduced in 1934, is a cross between J.T.D. and Marglobe”

Name: ORANGE BANANA #16
Description: reminiscent of Sun Gold but with more depth and diverse tones

Name: NATALS SAN MARZANO #17
Description: This seed came from my co worker at Sickles Market. I was told the seed came from his grandmother in Italy in 2020. Very large San Marzano weighing more that one pound each

Name: MR( GERMAN )STRIPY #18
Description: mild, sweet-tasting fruits have a high sugar content and grow to over 1 lb. each. Pretty and luscious, this tomato has rich yellow undertones covered with pinkish-red striping. Indeterminate.

Name: GREAT YELLOW BLUES #19
Description: “Recent variety created by Reinhard Kraft. Plant produce beefsteak type fruits which are medium sized, with shoulders more or less rounded.

Name: NEW JERSEY BEEFSTEAK #20
Description: “Delicious, flavorful, meaty fruits have smooth shoulders, not as rough and ridgy as Beefsteak and the blossom end scars are smaller. Prolific, vigorous plants produce luscious red fruits averaging 17 oz.

Name: JAPANESE BLACK TRIFEL #28
Description: “28 Heirloom with unusual pear shape and burgundy color, good yields of 4-6 ounce fruit with excellent rich flavor.

Name: TIREN SAN MARZANO AKA (CASEY’S DAD) #33
Description: “Developed in Italy, Tiren produces meaty, 5-6 oz. fruits with the classic San Marzano shape. Great flavor for sauce.

Name: SEAN’S YELLOW #34
Description: Determinate, (tree-type) regular leaf dwarf producing lots of 3-7 oz., smooth, medium-sized, oblate, bright-yellow fruits with a very pale yellow juicy flesh.

Name: WOLF FANG #38
Description: fruits are pink-reddish color, elongated pepper shaped, weighing 120-170 gr. Juicy, fleshy, firm, good balanced taste.

Name: RED OXHEART #40
Description: The large spreading vines of Oxheart tomatoes bear good amounts of 10 to 16 ounce fruit! Fruits are heart shaped and bright pink in color.

Name: PINK BOAR #41
Description: This 4 ounce gem is pinkish-wine colored with metallic green stripes. A great producer and is a definite winner if you want a smaller, juicy, sweet tomato.

Name: LUCKY TIGER #49
Description: As Lucky Tiger ripens, the green striping becomes more defined and the background turns red as the interior marbling develops

Name: YELLOW PLUM #52
Description: “These golden plum tomatoes stay firm when chopped. No more watery salsas! Prolific, determinate bush plants bear large, 4-5 oz. fruits.

Name: BRAD’S ATOMIC BOMB #53
Description: Elongated, large cherries in clusters. The color (and flavor!) is a full-blown assault on the senses—lavender and purple stripes, turning to technicolor olive-green, red, and brown/blue stripes when fully ripe.

Name: PRIMARY COLORS #69
Description: A gilded salad tomato with superb flavor, The 3-5 ounce fruit is scrumptious and snackable with a unique color pattern. This newer variety will display slight variations in size and color

Name: HILLBILLY #226
Description: Absolutely beautiful, blushing-bicolor fruits are produced in high yields, on vigorous, potato leafed vines. The deep golden skin is mottled and streaked with deep red and a sunset swirled flesh.

Name: ANANAS NOIRE #213
Description: these tomatoes have very rich, sweet, smoky, citrusy flavor and are born on very strong, and productive

Name: BLACK KIRM. #228
Description: One of the most beloved heirlooms of all time! Large, beautiful, beefsteak type fruits offer incredible vigor and production with rich, smoky sweet

Name: Blue Beauty #212
Description: Blue version of the gorgeous, delicious and extremely unique; one of the darkest and most exotic looking tomatoes in the world.

Name: BLACK BEAUTY #211
Description: Gorgeous, delicious and extremely unique; one of the darkest and most exotic looking tomatoes in the world

Name: PASCAL DE PICARDIE #207
Description: Rare-beautiful-delicious! Elongated, plum-shaped fruits are stunning in color and delectable in taste. Extremely meaty with minimal seeds and a sweet and complex flavor.

Name: LUCID GEM #209
Description: Lucid Gem is a vigorous, disease resistant plant,The fruits start out with deep purplish-blue shoulders and a silver base. As they ripen, the shoulders deepen to a purplish-black and the base transitions from vibrant yellow to a rich orange

Name: REBEL STARFIGHTER #214
Description: These exotic shaped jewels are deep purple with raspberry pink, mahogany, green, and coral striping with flecks of gold. The flesh is chocolate colored with rich, sweet and complex flavor.

Name: ROSSO SICILIAN #231
Description: Deeply ribbed, bright red fruits are produced in the masses on semi-determinate vines. One of the earliest varieties to ripen in the garden

Name: BENEVENTO F1 # 111
Description: Benevento F1 is a new red beefsteak tomato with yellow stripes that combines heirloom flavor with commercial slicer fruit characteristics.

Name: INDIGO KUMQUAT #2
Description: The first pear shaped tomato in the Indigo series produces strong plants absolutely crowded with 3 to 4 cm, bi-coloiured sweet-flavoured fruits

Name: INDIGO YELLOW PEAR #3
Description: Starting off yellow, the fruits slowly develop attractive purple-black shoulders at maturity.

Name: CHOCOLATE PEAR #5
Description: Expect huge crops of 'black', pear-shaped tomatoes over a very long season. Chocolate Pear has the rich tomato flavor that has made heirlooms so popular

Name: SUNGOLD #7
Description: Exceptionally sweet, bright tangerine-orange cherry tomatoes leave everyone begging for more. Vigorous plants start yielding early and bear right through the season

Name: INDIGO CHAMPAGNE ( CREAM BERRIES) #8
Description: Indigo Cream Berries cherry tomatoes are cream colored with deep-purple shoulders, and they are known to be sunburn and crack-resistant. They have a complex super-sweet tomato flavor and fairly low acidity.

Name: BLACK OPAL #26
Description: Black Opal has greatly improved growth habit. Fruit texture with a far sweeter flavor, The small fruit are borne on long, branched trusses, and plants produce approx 200 tomatoes per season

Name: Cream Sausage #31
Description: Here is a new and stunning tomato; an elongated paste tomato that is creamy white to pale yellow in color

Name: SWEET 100 #43
Description: Reliable cherry with prolific yields of great-tasting, 15–20 gm. fruits produced in large clusters. Widely adapted

Name: WHITE CHERRY #44
Description: Small bright white cherry tomatoes

Name: CITRINE #51
Description: exceptional snacker with rich, balanced flavor, a meaty bite, and resistance to the splitting and cracking common too many similar market varieties.”

Name: Mila #70
Description: This highly productive Russian variety grows long trusses of tangerine-colored, large, elongated, pear-shaped tomatoes that are firm, sweet and sublime for snacking!

Name: CREAMSICLE GRAPE #102
Description: “A small, light orange grape tomato. Pleasant sweet flavor raw, and excellent as a dried or oven roasted tomato

Name: LuckyBee F1. #103
Description: A new high performance hybrid cherry tomato. Fruits are green inside and a light burnt orange, with dark green stripes at the surface when ripe.

Name: Maderia F1#105
Description: A new high performance hybrid cherry tomato. Fruits are green inside and a light burnt orange, with dark green stripes at the surface when ripe

Name: Purple Bumble #106 & 215
Description: Purple Bumblebee is a true-breeding cherry tomato we bred on our farm. It is a purple cherry tomato with green stripes. Purple Bumblebee's flavor is bright and tangy. Plants are indeterminate vines that grow well both in containers and in the ground

Name: Lucky Age F1 #107
Description: Lucky Agi is a unique hybrid saladette tomato with great flavor and extended shelf-life. Plants are very vigorous vines that resist disease for extended production over a long season. Oval Green-Orange fruits are initially saladette sized, and later in the season they are large cherry tomatoes.

Name: Blush #108
Description: Beautiful, bright yellow snacking tomato. Red stripes appear as blossom-end red marbling develops. Strong plants tolerate tough conditions. Great in mixes with the other Artisan tomatoes. 25-30 gm.

Name: PINK CHERRYWINE, F1 #109
Description: “this is a pink tomato with green shoulders that fade with time. Pink CherryWine's flavor is bright and complex, for a cherry tomato

Name: GOLDEN CHERRYWINE F1 #110
Description: Fruits are yellow to orange with green shoulders that fade with ripening. Some may prefer flavor of yellow fruits with green shoulders. Some plants in current seed lot will produce fruits that are red with green shoulders

Name: KARMA PURPLE MULTIFLORA #112
Description: Ripe fruits start out as flattened saladettes, and end up as large cherry tomatoes. KARMA Purple Multiflora is a vigorous and productive 'potato-leaf'variety

Name: BARRY CRAZY CHERRY #218
Description: Multiflora variety producing sweet, pale-yellow, little cherries that grow in massive clusters

Name: INDIGO CHERRY DROP #223
Description: One most beautiful varieties in the garden year after year. Long strands of glowing and glistening, purple gems are quite literally dripping off the soft green vines.

Name: ISIS CANDY #234
Description: Prolific producer of beautiful golden cherry tomatoes with swirls of shimmery blush and pink at the base. Very sweet and flavorful

Name: BLUE PEAR #205
Description: Stunning, large, pear shaped fruits have deep purple shoulders and ripen to a beautiful burgandy base.

Name: ROSELLA #230
Description: Extremely long trusses of purple fruits have smoky, chocolate-colored shoulders and are packed with rich, sweet flavor

Name: GNOCCI DI LIMONE #212
Description: These cherry tomatoes are incredibly sweet, rich and full flavored with an amazing lemony zing”
